title: Magic Face D1-Future
summary: Magic face D1-Future, interactive watchface inspired by Star Trek
description: Magic face D1-Future is an absolutely futuristic Android Wear watch face we have ever created. Turn on the screen, and you will see the magic.Watch Face Features-Presets 6 themes, black&white/pink/red/yellow/green/blue-Supports Celsius and Fahrenheit-Change daily step goals, from 1000-20000-Watch battery -Time-Date-Week WATCH FACE INTERACTIVE FUNCTIONTap on the Step indicator of the watch face to see the whole record of your daily steps1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in the past 6 days with current step and distance info.3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not. 4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.Tap on other part of the screen to change color theme6 themes can be chosen, black&white/pink/red/yellow/green/blueMagic Interactive faces support all Android Wear watches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch!IMPORTANT: Interactive watch faces require the latest version of Android Wear.
descriptionHTML:
Magic face D1-Future is an absolutely futuristic Android Wear watch face we have ever created. Turn on the screen, and you will see the magic.

Watch Face Features
-Presets 6 themes, black&white/pink/red/yellow/green/blue
-Supports Celsius and Fahrenheit
-Change daily step goals, from 1000-20000
-Watch battery
-Time
-Date
-Week

WATCH FACE INTERACTIVE FUNCTION
Tap on the Step indicator of the watch face to see the whole record of your daily steps

1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.
2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in the past 6 days with current step and distance info.
3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not.
4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.

Tap on other part of the screen to change color theme
6 themes can be chosen, black&white/pink/red/yellow/green/blue

Magic Interactive faces support all Android Wear watches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch!

IMPORTANT: Interactive watch faces require the latest version of Android Wear.
